scripts.test-pkg: npm run reset && npm run build:temp && npm run test:temp
scripts.test-tsr: npm run reset && npm run build:temp && npm run build:temp:tsr && npm run test:temp:tsr
scripts.test-tsr-fix: npm run reset && npm run build:temp && npm run fix:code && npm run build:temp:tsr && npm run test:temp:tsr
scripts.prepare: npm run build && npm run setup
scripts.build: npm run copy:temp && npm run fix:tsconfig && cd temp && yarn && yarn add ts-runtime --dev && cd ..
scripts.setup: mkdir temp/algorithms-e && npm run fix:code:init && npm run build:temp
scripts.reset: cp -a temp/algorithms-e/. temp/algorithms && rm -r temp/lib && mkdir temp/lib
scripts.fix:tsconfig: cp temp/tsconfig.json temp/tsconfig.json-e && cp fix/tsconfig.json temp/tsconfig.json
scripts.copy:temp: rm -r temp && mkdir temp && cp -a node_modules/pretty-sort/. temp
scripts.build:temp:tsr:
cd temp && node_modules/.bin/tsr $(find algorithms -name '*.ts' -not -name '*spec.ts' | tr '
' ' ' | xargs)  -fec tsconfig.json && cd ..
